FuncDef: The display ike proposal command displays the configurations of IKE proposal.
Examples: priority   authentication method   authentication algorithm   encryption algorithm   Diffie-Hellman group   duration (seconds)
ExtraInfo:
The output of the display ike proposal command provides the following information:
PriorityAuthentication modeAuthentication algorithmEncryption algorithmDiffie-Hellman group identifierISAKMP SA duration
